name: iseeyou
description:
This is a simple horror game made for a game jam, sporting only one sound and zero drawn textures!

In it, you are placed in a random labyrinthine series of hallways, in which you must find the entrance to deeper and deeper floors. All the while, however, something is following you, whose presence is marked by an ambient static noise...

It sees you. But you mustn't see it. If you do, it will move fast - very fast.

Don't let it get you...
